casebody.data:
Ezra BENJAMIN
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 12, 2019 Justine F. Miller, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. James M. Ralls, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Ezra Benjamin's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 905 , 205 A.3d 820 (2019), is denied.

McDONALD, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
